title: The WORST Programming Languages EVER #shorts
transcript: these are the worst programming languages of all time you really don't want to learn python at this age it's basically irrelevant it can be completely replaced by go and rust and finally it's just really slow and really hard to read here we have another kind of obscure one now i've never used this one personally but my friend has and he said it was bad and i kind of agree with him now some people are going to hate on me for this one because this one's kind of popular but i honestly don't like lua because it starts arrays at 1 and as we all know every programming language has to be exactly the same subscribe for more programming tips
